org.mxupdate.test
Class ExportParser

java.lang.Object
  org.mxupdate.test.ExportParser
Direct Known Subclasses:
InquiryData.InquiryExportParser
public class ExportParser
extends Object

The class parses informations from an MxUpdate export.

Version:
$Id: ExportParser.java 514 2009-08-16 11:42:55Z tim.moxter $
Author:
The MxUpdate Team

Nested Class Summary
 class ExportParser.Line
          The class is used to build a hierarchy of lines depending of the ExportParser.Line.shifting where the text of a line begins.
